speaker: President. −
english: President. − Mr Chichester, I think you failed to hear when the Commissioner quoted extensively from Gordon Brown’s speech to the Labour Party Conference today or else you were otherwise occupied, but we were very much fascinated by this intervention.
original: President. − Mr Chichester, I think you failed to hear when the Commissioner quoted extensively from Gordon Brown’s speech to the Labour Party Conference today or else you were otherwise occupied, but we were very much fascinated by this intervention.
agenda_item: Road Map for renewable energy in Europe (debate)
